entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 7:04 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning and 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 10. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:04 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 7:04 PM CDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
